Package org.apache.wayang.core.platform

Interface Executor

All Superinterfaces:
CompositeExecutionResource, ExecutionResource, ReferenceCountable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ExecutorTemplate, FlinkExecutor, GenericJdbcExecutor, GiraphExecutor, JavaExecutor, JdbcExecutor, PushExecutorTemplate, SparkExecutor, TensorflowExecutor
public interface Executor extends CompositeExecutionResource
An executor executes ExecutionOperators.

    • execute

      void execute(ExecutionStage stage, OptimizationContext optimizationContext, ExecutionState executionState)
      Executes the given stage.
      Parameters:
      stage - should be executed; must be executable by this instance, though
      optimizationContext -
      executionState - provides and accepts execution-related objects @return collected metadata from instrumentation

    • getCrossPlatformExecutor

      CrossPlatformExecutor getCrossPlatformExecutor()
      If this instance is instrumented by a CrossPlatformExecutor, this method provides the latter.
      Returns:
      the instrumenting CrossPlatformExecutor or null if none
